Hi there: Thanks for reaching out to Ghostery!
1. Click on the Ghostery icon to open the panel.
2. Click the three stacked lines to open a menu.
4. Scroll down to the “Custom filters” to enable those.
5. Copy and paste the following filters:
- to hide all svg's on a page example.com##svg
- to block loading svg files from network: *.svg^$domain=example.com
Those steps should help. Let us know how it goes!
